defenders.name: Firewall Nodes
defenders.flavorText: Firewall Nodes are the first line of defense against cyber attacks. When a threat is detected, they take action to block the attacker and prevent further damage.

defenders.name: Lunar Sentinels
defenders.flavorText: Lunar Sentinels are the guardians of the moon. They protect the lunar surface from any threats that may come from Earth or beyond.

defenders.name: Nova Cruisers
defenders.flavorText: Nova Cruisers are the elite defenders of the solar system. They protect planets from any hostile forces that may come from outside the system.

defenders.name: Time Guardians
defenders.flavorText: Time Guardians are the protectors of the timeline. They ensure that history remains unchanged and that no one interferes with the past or future.
